Description: Solid-cast copper alloy seated figure of a cat-headed goddess wearing a composite crown; clenched left hand holding an unidentified object; throne has incised decoration; tangs beneath the throne and the base.
Excavator/field collector: Field Collection by: Dr Joseph John Acworth
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 1993-2003, Newcastle, The Hancock Museum, Land of the Pharaohs
Acquisition name: Donated by: Mrs Marion Whiteford Acworth JP
